Title: Magic Rss Menu Control
Description: Make with the magic​​​​​​ rss menu control for a ​touchscreen enabled webstie (​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​ e.g. for a Tablet PC ​) or internet television  Show a Silverlight Application, cloud document or HTML document in the other part from the screen.
HomeWiki:
Magic Rss menu Control in Action.



What can you do with the Magic Rss Menu Control

Scenario 1: Show Rss Feeds on your Webpage

You can show Rss Feeds ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​on your website, the user can add the rss feeds easely to a webrowser

Example Rss Navigation Menu BBC.
Example Rss VisualStudioMagazine HTML Page.

Scenario 2: Use the Control as Silverlight Menu ( Very​ easy way to develop in Silverlight​​​​​​​​​​​​​​)​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​

On the left side from the page you van the Rss Menu. You can navigate in the second frame to one other Silverlight Control, HTML page, Cloud Document
You don't have to make one big silverlight application. You can make different lightweight silverlight applications and also use HTML, ASP.Net...

Example Website.

Scenario 3: Make a RSS Bing Search Robot.

Bing support Rss Search possibilities. Yes you can search with Rss Feeds

Example Bing Search Robot.

Scenario 4: Add ads to your Rss Feed

You can add avertisement in your Rss Feed. The control suport nested rss feeds. You can place a link for each items in the feed. If the user clicks on the link one others rss feed is openend

Check this out
Nested Rss feeds and Advertisements.
